etl.query:
SELECT t.id AS `key`, n.namespace AS namespace, t.name AS name, t.value AS value, 'ADMIN' AS created_by, CASE WHEN t.created IS NULL THEN NOW() ELSE t.created END AS created FROM tag t, namespace n WHERE t.namespace_id = n.id;
INSERT INTO machine_tag(key,namespace,name,value,created_by,created) VALUES (?key,?namespace,?name,?value,?created_by,?created);
